$description: | What does this do? | Requires MFA to enroll a device into Microsoft Intune. | | Why should you use this? | If you require MFA, employees and students wanting to enroll devices must first authenticate with a second device and two forms of credentials. We do not want unauthorized users joining devices to our network. | | What is the end-user impact? | High Impact. Users must fulfill an MFA prompt before enrolling a device into Intune. | | Learn more | [Confgiure Intune to Require MFA](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/MEM/intune/enrollment/multi-factor-authentication#configure-intune-to-require-multifactor-authentication-at-device-enrollment) |

excludeGroups: ${urn:resource:MSGraph:Groups/Baseline - Unrestricted Access From Unmanaged Devices And Untrusted Locations?id}

$friendlyName: Baseline - Require MFA for Intune Enrollment
